name: Oven-Baked Potato Keftes
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Boil potatoes until tender, and then drain well. Mash in a bowl.
While potatoes are boiling, heat oil in a skillet, and saute onions until lightly browned.
Combine mashed potatoes and onion, then set aside until cooled to room temperature.
Heat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a baking sheet.

To the mashed-potato mixture, add walnuts, bread crumbs, eggs, nutmeg, cardamom, coriander, salt and pepper. Using about 1/4 cup of the potato mixture for each, form flattened oval patties, and place them on the baking sheet. Bake patties for about 10 minutes per side, until browned.
